Articles.Content:
These are produced under the fictional company Terazone.

Download (link suspended), with the decent, barely working parts.

As soon as I figure out solar panels I'll update this. Don't expect regular updates, I work on parts when I want some variety, and when I'm bored.

Parts and part list are subject to change.

Pictures of what I've produced so far.

Edited January 28, 2014 by Aphox
Removed download link
Solar panels are a pain in the rear. What issues ya having with em bud??
The little things are the best!

Hey, I installed this one, and I love it for the most part. The parts are interesting and come in very handy sometimes. I only have two issues with it. First are the names. Naming things after girls, while cute, is not very good when I am trying to locate a part by name and sort through them.

The second thing, the Electric RCS. I love them... seriously. The only thing is that they consume my entire battery the instant they become active. I am trying to find a way to remedy this, but I am coming up very short. The usage/second shows as inifinty/sec. I looked in the .cfg file and there doesn't seem to be a variable to fix it in there. I am working on finding a way myself, but inifinity/sec seems a little high. If I find something, I will figure out how to balance it and post it on here.

Nice mod but I will put what I posted on the spaceport page of this mod.

"Why???? I went through the flags andÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ WHY ARE THERE FLAGS LABELLED Ã¢â‚¬ËœnaziÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ AND Ã¢â‚¬ËœnaziverseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢!??? WHY HAVE YOU CREATED TWO FLAGS FOR AN INNOCENT GAME WITH SWASTIKAÃ¢â‚¬â„¢S IN THEM?? Other than that, a fun mod. For my rant unfortunately I will donate a Ã¢â‚¬â„¢1 starÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ rating"

Sorry about being so harsh but...
A swastika is a sign of peace. He is free to name flags whatever he likes, just so long as he doesn't try and spread his 'views' on this sight. Calm down.
Not in that context.
I believe the name "Unix" is trademarked, so you should be careful using that.

Is anyone else getting these panels pointing the grey side at the sun instead of the blue side?

Also, can you make the bigger ones track on 2 axises?

I believe the name "Unix" is trademarked, so you should be careful using that.

you cannot trademark a word like that.

you cannot trademark a word like that.

I don't care what can or cannot be done, I'm just pointing out that there is a "Unix"-related trademark.
Will get around to redoing names and other stuff soon.

here is the @part if u want the 2 antana to work with rt2 made them have range of 5Mm and 50Mm

@PART[TzAntennaRotate]

{

MODULE

{

name = ModuleRTAntenna

Mode0OmniRange = 0

Mode1OmniRange = 5000000

MaxQ = 3000

EnergyCost = 0.6

DeployFxModules = 0

TRANSMITTER

{

PacketInterval = 0.3

PacketSize = 2

PacketResourceCost = 15.0

}

}

MODULE

{

name = ModuleSPUPassive

}

}

@PART[TzTransmitterHeavy]

{

MODULE

{

name = ModuleRTAntenna

Mode0OmniRange = 0

Mode1OmniRange = 50000000

MaxQ = 3000

EnergyCost = 0.6

DeployFxModules = 0

TRANSMITTER

{

PacketInterval = 0.3

PacketSize = 2

PacketResourceCost = 15.0

}

}

MODULE

{

name = ModuleSPUPassive

}

}

Made my cfg like this

@PART[TzAntennaRotate]

{

MODULE

{

name = ModuleSPU

}

MODULE

{

name = ModuleRTAntennaPassive

TechRequired = unmannedTech

OmniRange = 5000000

EnergyCost = 0.93

TRANSMITTER

{

PacketInterval = 0.3

PacketSize = 2

PacketResourceCost = 15.0

}

}

as i give the antenna the command core and MaxQ= will just make it brake on launch which is fine. I should have added the Mode0OmniRange = 0

Mode1OmniRange = 50000000 the way i have it doesnt matter if its out or not still as same range.but thanks sidfu i didnt think to add Mode0OmniRange = 0

Mode1OmniRange = 50000000 think a will but change the first part to look like Mode0OmniRange = 500 because really should a antenna have range down just not as far ?

And Sidfu can u not give the command core if u add the 2 ranges having no luck in adding the core back.
